__comment: This file generated automatically with Patchouli.js. All changes will be rewritten
name: C Metals

pages.title: Iron
pages.text: Use ironwood or ferrous juniper. The latter can be burned with fire to yield more iron.

pages.title: Copper
pages.text: Sieve red sand. Yes, you need a smeltery to obtain copper. Later on, sieve dried sand and use Mekanism's enrichment chamber.

pages.title: Tin
pages.text: Sieve white sand or garbage piles. Later on, sieve crushed andesite and use Mekanism's enrichment chamber.

pages.title: Gold
pages.text: Bathe pigs in witchwater and kill the resulting zombie pigmen.

pages.title: Aluminum
pages.text: Nether portal spread. Later alternatively sieve compressed gunpowder and use mekanism.

pages.title: Cobalt
pages.text: Emerald blocks turn into cobalt via nether portal spread.

pages.title: Nickel
pages.text: Many possible ways, for example grindstone forms of iron, like native iron cluster or dirty iron.
